verses.verse: My breath <S%H7307><s%> is corrupt, <S%H2254><s%> my days <S%H3117><s%> are extinct, <S%H2193><s%> the graves <S%H6913><s%> are ready for me.
Are there not mockers <S%H2049><s%> with me? and does not my eye <S%H5869><s%> continue <S%H3885><s%> in their provocation? <S%H4784><s%>
Lay <S%H7760><s%> down now, <S%H4994><s%> put me in a surety <S%H6148><s%> with you; who <S%H4310><s%> is he that will strike <S%H8628><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> with me?
For you have hid <S%H6845><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> from understanding: <S%H7922><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall you not exalt <S%H7311><s%> them.
He that speaks <S%H5046><s%> flattery <S%H2506><s%> to his friends, <S%H7453><s%> even the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> shall fail. <S%H3615><s%>
He has made <S%H3322><s%> me also a byword <S%H4914><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> and aforetime <S%H6440><s%> I was as a tabret. <S%H8611><s%>
My eye <S%H5869><s%> also is dim <S%H3543><s%> by reason of sorrow, <S%H3708><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> my members <S%H3338><s%> are as a shadow. <S%H6738><s%>

Upright <S%H3477><s%> men shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> and the innocent <S%H5355><s%> shall stir <S%H5782><s%> up himself against <S%H5921><s%> the hypocrite. <S%H2611><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> also shall hold <S%H270><s%> on his way, <S%H1870><s%> and he that has clean <S%H2891><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be stronger <S%H555><s%> and stronger.
But as for you all, <S%H3605><s%> do you return, <S%H7725><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> now: <S%H4994><s%> for I cannot <S%H3808><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> one wise <S%H2450><s%> man among you.
My days <S%H3117><s%> are past, <S%H5674><s%> my purposes <S%H2154><s%> are broken <S%H5423><s%> off, even the thoughts <S%H4180><s%> of my heart. <S%H3824><s%>
They change <S%H7760><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%> into day: <S%H3117><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> is short <S%H7138><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of darkness. <S%H2822><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I wait, <S%H6960><s%> the grave <S%H7585><s%> is my house: <S%H1004><s%> I have made <S%H7502><s%> my bed <S%H3326><s%> in the darkness. <S%H2822><s%>
I have said <S%H7121><s%> to corruption, <S%H7845><s%> You are my father: <S%H1><s%> to the worm, <S%H7415><s%> You are my mother, <S%H517><s%> and my sister. <S%H269><s%>
And where <S%H346><s%> <S%H645><s%> is now <S%H645><s%> my hope? <S%H8615><s%> as for my hope, <S%H8615><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> shall see <S%H7789><s%> it?
They shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the bars <S%H905><s%> of the pit, <S%H7585><s%> when <S%H518><s%> our rest <S%H5183><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> is in the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
